description:
****** Free Zombie Shooting Game! ******

***** Intense zombie-blasting action ******

The zombies are coming, just like they always said they would. You have been training for this moment your entire life. Are you up to the challenge?

This game is an arcade-style shoot 'em up, with full physics ragdolls, crisp high quality sound effects, a rockin' soundtrack and a massive weapons arsenal to choose from.

Features:

* Multiple levels of excitement
* Easy and intuitive touch controls
* Optimized performance
* Smooth and polished gameplay
* High-quality super-realistic sound effects

Stop the apocalypse!

Download FREE Today!
